infobox.Japanese title:: 暗号付きの招待状  (Angō-tsuki no Shōtaijō)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Kogoro Mouri  Hiroshi Agasa  Ai Haibara  Detective Boys  Miwako Sato  Wataru Takagi
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Kenichi Ogata as Hiroshi Agasa  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima, Wataru Takagi  Atsuko Yuya as Miwako Sato  Aya Hisakawa as Kaori Kitasaka  Keiko Komyoji as Mrs. Kitasaka  Kozo Mito as Sakata  Jun Inoue as Kohei Nagai

sections.Situation:
A client named Kaori Kitasaka asks Kogoro for help to decode the location in an invitation. Before she leaves, she gives Kogoro her home and cellphone number. After realizing he has deduced and given her the wrong location, Kogoro tries calling her home number but realize she gave him a fake number. Kogoro call her cellphone number and she picks up. Kogoro gives her the correct location, Bell Tree Tower, to Kaori.
Conan finds her suspicious and figures out Kaori's real home phone number then calls it. He's surprised when Sato begins talking to him on the phone and the group discovers that a gun (Nambu Taisho 14) is missing from Kaori's home.
They find out that Mitsuhei Nagai, Kaori's ex-boyfriend that two-timed her, and his fiancé Misato Taniguchi are going to be at Bell Tree Tower, and then realize her motive for going there is revenge. Kogoro, Conan, Ran, Sato, and Takagi all rush there to stop her. As a last ditch effort, Conan sends her a text message, hoping it would change her mind.
They arrive at the party and start looking for her, they spot someone that looks similar to her and chase after her thinking that she's Kaori, but Conan spots the real Kaori and follows her. Kaori walks up to the stage where her ex-boyfriend and fiancé are and seemingly starts pulling out the gun.

sections.Trivia: - The 567 Koba Taxi is a 2001 green Toyota Crown Sedan [XS10] 3D version. The license plate number is 新宿 500, こ 58-84 (Shinjuju 500, Ko 58-84).
